verses.name: Psalms 38:12
verses.text: They also that seek after my life lay snares for me: and they that seek my hurt speak mischievous things, and imagine deceits all the day long.

verses.name: Psalms 38:13
verses.text: But I, as a deaf man, heard not; and I was as a dumb man that openeth not his mouth.

verses.name: Psalms 38:14
verses.text: Thus I was as a man that heareth not, and in whose mouth are no reproofs.

verses.name: Psalms 38:15
verses.text: For in thee, O Lord, do I hope: thou wilt hear, O Lord my God.

verses.name: Psalms 38:16
verses.text: For I said, Hear me, lest otherwise they should rejoice over me: when my foot slippeth, they magnify themselves against me.
